description: This file defines the DashboardProvider class, which manages vehicle data for a dashboard, fetching vehicle lists and computing counts for total, active, and maintenance vehicles. It uses a data source for data retrieval and notifies listeners on data load.

classes.name: DashboardProvider
classes.description: A provider class that supplies vehicle dashboard data and notifies UI components upon data updates.

methods.name: DashboardProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a data source.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads vehicle data from the data source and updates vehicle counts, then notifies listeners.
